field.name: summary
field.value: Performance Counters not updated on releasing a typed factory

field.name: description
field.value: When tracked objects created by a typed factory are released through its releasing method perf counter has been updated as expected, instead if do not use the factory method but you release the factory itself, dipsose method will be called on the created objects so I assume objects have been disposed as they should but perf counter has not been updated and those objectes are still displayed as tracked. see http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13527784/typedfactory-vs-performance-monitor#comment18568207_13527784 for more details.
